graphql.query:
query { 
    CalAnswers_Grade (CourseControlNbr: {{CourseControlNbr}}, year: 2021, semester: "Fall") {
        _id
        GradeSortNbr
        EnrollmentCnt
        CourseControlNbr
        InstructorName
        CourseSubjectShortNm
        CourseNumber
        SectionNbr
        GradeSubtypeDesc
        GradeTypeDesc
        GradeNm
        CourseTitleNm
        term {
            year
            month
            semester
        }
    }
}
